欺罔: (ぎもう) - deception; defrauding someone; fooling someone; swindling; false pretences
欺騙: (ぎへん) - deception/deceit/cheating; (esp. ぎへん) military deception
欽定: (きんてい) - authorized (by imperial or royal order); authorised; appointed; enacted; established
欽定憲法: (きんていけんぽう) - constitution granted by the Emperor
款: (kan) - boa vontade, título, cabeçalho, artigo; benevolência, sentimento amigável
款を通ずる: (かんをつうずる) - to communicate secretly; to form a close friendship
款冬: (フキ) - giant butterbur (Petasites japonicus); Japanese sweet coltsfoot
款待: (かんたい) - warm welcome; friendly reception; hospitality; entertainment
歌: (ka/uta) - song , song; classical Japanese poetry (esp. tanka); modern poetry
歌いまくる: (うたいまくる) - to sing energetically; to sing with abandon
歌い上げる: (うたいあげる) - to sing at the top of one's voice; to express one's feelings fully in a poem
歌い出し: (うたいだし) - first line (of a poem); first bars (of a melody)
歌い女: (うたいめ) - woman who entertains customers with song and dance
歌い始める: (うたいはじめる) - to start singing
歌い捲る: (うたいまくる) - to sing energetically; to sing with abandon
歌い物: (うたいもの) - utai (noh chant) piece for recitation
歌う: (utau) - to sing; to sing (elogiar alguém em um poema, etc.), to compose a poem, to recite a poem
歌の心: (うたのこころ) - spirit of a poem; true meaning of a poem
歌の道: (うたのみち) - art of tanka poetry
歌ガルタ: (うたガルタ) - cards with stanzas of waka written on them; card-matching game played with these cards
歌会: (かかい) - poetry party or competition; gathering of tanka poets
歌会始: (うたかいはじめ) - annual New Year's poetry reading
歌会始め: (うたかいはじめ) - annual New Year's poetry reading
歌劇団: (かげきだん) - opera company; opera troupe; musical revue; operetta company; operetta troupe
歌加留多: (うたがるた) - cards with stanzas of waka written on them; card-matching game played with these cards
歌口: (うたぐち) - flute mouthpiece; poetic style
歌唱力: (かしょうりょく) - one's skill as a singer
歌唱指導: (かしょうしどう) - teaching of singing
歌垣: (うたがき) - gathering of men and women who sang courtship songs to each other and danced; dancing and singing feast of young men and women in ancient Japan
歌境: (かきょう) - mood of a poem; poet's mood when writing
歌妓: (かぎ) - woman who earns her living by entertaining with song, dance and playing the shamisen; geisha who sings at parties
歌心: (うたごころ) - (waka) poetic sentiment; waka-composing mood; solid grounding in waka; meaning of a waka poem
歌曲集: (かきょくしゅう) - song collection; collection of lieder
歌枕: (うたまくら) - oft-repeated descriptive epithets in poetry
歌沢: (うたざわ) - (歌沢 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen) slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
歌沢節: (うたざわぶし) - (歌沢節 was used especially by the Tora school that emphasized voice; 哥沢節 was used especially by the Shiba school that emphasized shamisen)  slow-paced style of shamisen music with vocal accompaniment (popular during the late Edo period)
歌物: (うたもの) - an utai (noh chant) piece for recitation; accompanied singing in which the singing is emphasized over the instrumental part (emphasised)
歌留多: (カルタ) - karuta (por: carta); traditional Japanese playing cards
歌番組: (うたばんぐみ) - popular song program on radio or television
歌神: (うたがみ) - god of waka; god of song; muse
歌舞伎劇: (かぶきげき) - kabuki play; kabuki drama
歌舞伎十八番: (かぶきじゅうはちばん) - repertoire of 18 kabuki plays
歌舞伎座: (kabukiza) - kabuki troupe, kabuki theater (theatre); Kabuki-za (teatro em Tóquio)
歌舞伎狂言: (かぶききょうげん) - kabuki play/kabuki drama; kabuki script
歌舞伎症候群: (かぶきしょうこうぐん) - {med} Kabuki syndrome; Kabuki makeup syndrome
歌舞伎者: (かぶきもの) - (yoji) dandy; peacock; early-17th-century equivalent of present-day yakuza; Edo-period eccentric who attracted public attention with their eye-catching clothes, peculiar hairstyle, and weird behavior
歌舞伎踊: (かぶきおどり) - early kabuki dance
歌舞伎踊り: (かぶきおどり) - early kabuki dance
歌舞音曲: (かぶおんきょく) - (yoji) public music and dancing; performance of song and dance entertainment
歌袋: (うたぶくろ) - bag for holding waka manuscript paper; vocal sac; pen-name of Fujitani Mitsue (1798-1824)
歌詞: (kashi) - letras de música, palavras de uma canção, libreto
歌詞カード: (かしカード) - lyric sheet; card with the lyrics to a song
歌語: (かご) - words mainly used in songs or poetry
歌集: (かしゅう) - anthology; book of poetry
歎く: (なげく) - to sigh; to lament; to grieve
歎じる: (たんじる) - to grieve; to lament; to sigh in admiration
